content:

author: Micah McCartney
title: Why China Won't Condemn Hamas
description: Israeli researcher Tuvia Gering explains the reasons behind anti-Israel sentiments in China.
content:
As the Israel-Gaza conflict unfolds, China is positioning itself as a peace broker, but it has yet to condemn the Hamas militants who sparked the crisis.

title: ONZ nazywa Gazę „cmentarzem dzieci”
description: Gaza is becoming a "graveyard for children", U.N. Secretary General Antonio Guterres said on Monday, amplifying demands for a ceasefire in the enclave, where Palestinian health authorities said the death toll from Israeli strikes had exceeded 10,000.
